column5: Do you ever have dreams of your favorite fish? I had a dream recenty that carp where in the areas I fish. And that there is a warm spill coming. I decided to check and see if the carp where in .. and they were!! As for the warm spill well....  . I think I fish carp so much that I'm spiritually connected to them.  I know when they are coming into the lakes. ha ha and where they will be going first.   dsn  Nah the truth is I Got a vision from heaven
lol i actually had a dream the other night ... i heard my bite alarm go crazy ... picked up my rod and fish on ... but i woke up not too long after that ....

DSN I'm thinking back to all those times I caught you spawning with the female (or male?) carp in June...NASTY! (j/k)  As far as dreams go, I used to dream about saltwater fly fishing for coho salmon until I punched the wall next to my bed.  Dreaming about double hauling and shooting 90ft of fly line can be dangerous.  I had to bandage my wrist for a good 2 weeks.  THE CARP ARE COMING, THE CARP ARE COMING!
i had a dream not to long ago where i caught this huge fish it was at lake Nipissing  i think it was carp and then i woke up not to long after...
I have a recurring dream about a Mermaid...but I always wake up before I can get too far into it....
im not lucky enough to have dreams about fishing.  my luck is more like dreams about the inlaws moving in.  cheers!
It wasn't that one in the movie SPLASH with Tom Hanks was it. I think her names Hannah, good looking mermaid that girl.
dreaming about my favorite fish is how I get thru work and traffic .
I always dream about catching that prize fish the night before I go fishing.......  Funny how the night after actually going fishing I always seem to be dreaming about the prize fish that got away!
I sleep with nightmares only.  When I'm awake it's the dream. lol.
i still have nightmares about the 50+ musky i raised last september... i'll be back to get 'er soon enough!
so could one say dreaming about fish would be a wetdream..they do live in water.....
I don't have any fishing dreams that I can remember but this past Sunday night my wife said I was yelling "Get the Net" & she looked to see if I was awake & of course I wasn't.
Thats funny!! Well I did  a follow on my dream and got skunked.
So let me get this straight:  a) you dream about fish  the fish you dream about are CARP????  My friend, you need serious help.
what's wrong with that? ... well then i probably need some serious help too
Well we can't make it through life without any help.
we ALL need help....  by the way I dream of musky
I dream of the musky that eat the carp.
yikes!!
